data.name: fortran-src
data.description: Fortran parsing and static analysis infrastructure

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "alternations -- you may have to download the resolver manually.)*"
"fortran-src is an open-source Haskell library and command-line application for the lexing, parsing, and static analysis of Fortran source code. It provides an interface to build other tools"
"This package primarily exports a Haskell library, but also builds an executable that can be used for testing and debugging. The library is the basis of the CamFort verification tool."
